review_body: As a mom gifting the infinity knot to my daughter before college, this hit deep. The keepsake card from 'mom' is gold (literally). She's worn it non-stop, says it grounds her. Quality holds up to her active lifestyle—no snags or fades. Can't wait to shop again.
Gifted to my dad; the message card brought tears. Durable chain, meaningful design. Feels premium for the price.

This personalized bestie necklace was a surprise for my college roommate reunion. Custom name engraved flawlessly, message card heartfelt. We've both been layering it with other pieces—it's become our 'sisterhood' staple. Loox photos don't do the detail justice. Room for a longer chain next time.
Timely delivery, beautiful craftsmanship. Can't wait to shop again.
